name: Dino-War
description:
Dino-War

This game is a dinosaur themed counting game called Dino-War. This was made for The Odin Project's first game jam, where the theme was edutainment.

How to play:

The rules are of the game are simple: count the point values of each side's dinosaurs.

Each level will have a unique set of dinosaurs worth different amounts of points. If you get close to a perfect score for both sides, you can proceed to the next level. There are 3 different difficulties and 10 different levels for each difficulty, making for 30 levels in total. Can you beat them all?
